objects.text:
Stainless Steel Construction
Dual Size Options (750ml/1000ml)
Hook Lid For Easy Carrying
Sleek Everyday Design

product_details.name: Hydra Sipper Bottle By JUST
product_details.description:
Colours : Black Capacity : 1000 ml and 750 mlMaterial : Stainless SteelInsulation : Single WalledUSP :• Has hook in the lid to make it easier to carry.• Large mouth for easy cleaning.•Evergreen Sleek Design.
•Use it as everyday school bottle or Gym shaker.•Fits in back side pockets, bicycle holders and car bottle holders easily.

banner_details:
The banner features a bold promotional design for a steel water bottle flash sale. The background utilizes a dark gradient (from #222222 to #333333) with subtle geometric and circular overlays, giving it a modern, sleek aesthetic. At the top, a prominent headline ("heading") in large white block lettering draws attention, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in blue, emphasizing the featured product. A central description block ("description") lists the product highlights in concise white text. The brand name ("text_overlay") is stylishly placed mid-banner in blue. A bold red tagline ("tagline") adds urgency before revealing a price ("price") in contrasting large white numerals. A vivid red call-to-action button ("cta") encourages immediate purchase. A product image ("product_image") aligned to the right visually supports the promotion. The banner design balances clean typography and structured layout with a strong call-to-action.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Gray: #222222 / #333333
- Accent Blue: #1A7FBA
- White: #FFFFFF
- Bright Red: #E74C3C
- Light Gray outline border: #4A4A4A
product_color: The product image showcases sleek black insulated bottles, where the primary color is matte black (#0D0D0D), conveying elegance and minimalism. Slight gradients and reflections in the black finish add subtle contrast and give the surface texture and dimension. The brand logo is in a soft silver-gray tone (#BFBFBF), providing a clean, sophisticated contrast while enhancing visibility and branding. The blending of the matte and semi-gloss textures introduces depth without overpowering the minimal aesthetic. For an advertisement banner, a complementary palette could include: jet black (#0D0D0D), silver-gray (#BFBFBF), charcoal (#2F2F2F), and off-white (#F5F5F5).
